definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Museums and the Smithsonian Institution buildings are on the north and south sides of the Mall.
sentences.chinese: 博物館和史密森氏學會大樓在廣場的北面和南面。

sentences.english: Two bridges spanning the glass-covered intermediate space connect the exhibition area with the southern element.
sentences.chinese: 兩座橋橫跨玻璃覆蓋的空間連接了南面的展覽面積。

sentences.english: It is the best to observe this eclipse at locations not obscured to the southwest.
sentences.chinese: 最佳觀測地點爲西南面沒有阻擋的場地。

sentences.english: Yangshuo lies in the northeast of Guangxi Province and to the southeast of Guilin City.
sentences.chinese: 陽朔坐落於廣西省東北部，在桂林的東南面。

sentences.english: The farm buildings border the courtyard on the south.
Located along Jiangtai Road, south of Holiday Inn Lido Beijing. Short drive to the airport.
sentences.chinese: 位於京順路，麗都酒店的南面，去首都機場很方便。

sentences.english: Maocaojie locates in the south of Nanxian county of Yiyang city.
sentences.chinese: 茅草街在益陽南縣的最南面。

sentences.english: The panzers then swung into action, launching an outflanking attack to the south of the town.
sentences.chinese: 裝甲部隊開始參戰，從城市的南面進行迂迴攻擊。

sentences.english: He was escorted back to the nether regions of Main Street.
sentences.chinese: 他被護送回中央大道南面的地方。

sentences.english: The construction is going on in the three metter width to the south of this area, so we can't get into it.
sentences.chinese: 地盤南面三米寬的區域內正在施工，我們不能進入。

sentences.english: In the southern side providing light by the openings were created in two ways.
sentences.chinese: 在南面通過兩種方式的開洞提供了自然光。

sentences.english: Other major rivers include the Struma and the Maritsa rivers in the south.
sentences.chinese: 其他主要的河流包括南面的斯注瑪河以及馬裏查河。

sentences.english: Spree River slowly flows through the urban area from the south.
sentences.chinese: 施普雷河從南面緩緩流過市區。

sentences.english: To the south east of the Quinta lies the Rio Formosa Estuary, which has extensive salt pans.
sentences.chinese: 在南面的金塔東鄰約臺塑口，其中有廣泛的鹽田。

sentences.english: The United States bounds on Mexico in the south.
sentences.chinese: 美國的南面與墨西哥接壤。

sentences.english: Also, notice the star Elnath at the southern tip of Auriga.
sentences.chinese: 同時，可以看到五車五載御夫座的南面頂端。

definition: south/south side/southern part/to the south of
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
west/west side/western part/to the west of
east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
